description: The Clinical Indications (reason for exam) and associated comments.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of users who reviewed this order.

columns.name: CLIN_IND_TEXT
columns.description: Clinical indications (reason for exam) free text answer to an order-specific question for this order.

columns.name: CLIN_IND_CMT_TEXT
columns.description: Clinical indications (reason for exam) free text comment to an order-specific question for this order.
